title: Private Equity Giant David Rubenstein Makes the Case for Bitcoin
description: Billionaire private equity titan David Rubenstein believes Bitcoin (BTC) is here to stay thanks to growing institutional interest as evidenced by BlackRock’s application for a spot bitcoin ETF as well as general global demand for a form of money that can’t be controlled by governments.

title: Tether ‘welcomes’ PayPal’s PYUSD stablecoin to the market, says CTO Paolo Ardoino
description:
Paolo Ardoino, CTO of Tether (USDT), said in an Aug. 8 statement shared with CryptoSlate that he welcomed PayPal’s entrance into the stablecoin industry. Ardoino said PayPal’s foray into the field would enhance the overall growth of the ecosystem as it would drive competing firms to develop solutions that would further boost adoption and innovation. […]

The post Tether ‘welcomes’ PayPal’s PYUSD stablecoin to the market, says CTO Paolo Ardoino appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Federal Reserve creates ‘Novel Activities Supervision Program’ to oversee new financial technologies
description:
The Federal Reserve Board announced on Aug. 8 the creation of the Novel Activities Supervision Program, a key initiative designed to oversee complex and rapidly advancing technologies within the banking sector, including those related to crypto-assets and blockchain technology. In a significant move aimed at aligning financial innovation with regulatory oversight, the program will foster […]

The post Federal Reserve creates ‘Novel Activities Supervision Program’ to oversee new financial technologies appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Report: Kenyan Police Raid Worldcoin’s Offices Just Days After Govt Suspended the Crypto Project
description: A team of Kenyan police officers is reported to have raided the premises used by Worldcoin and seized devices storing users’ data. The raid came just days after the Kenyan government announced the suspension of Worldcoin’s activities in the country. Officers Armed With Search Warrant The Kenyan police recently raided a building housing cryptocurrency and […]

title: US state banks now need Fed’s nod for crypto activities
description: If there’s one thing the world of finance knows, it’s that when the U.S. Federal Reserve takes a stance, you better pay attention. In a bold move, the Fed has just mandated that state banks under its jurisdiction will need an official written approval before delving into certain crypto activities, specifically involving dollar tokens. These ... Read more

title: DeFi Protocol Steadefi Exploited for Over $1.1 Million
description:
Steadefi, a decentralized finance application, suffered a hack earlier today. The DeFi protocol, which offers leveraged yield vaults and lending pools, was exploited to the tune of $1.14 million after its protocol deployer wallet, which also controlled all of the app’s vaults, was compromised. The Steadefi team has attempted to contact the responsible parties in […]

The post DeFi Protocol Steadefi Exploited for Over $1.1 Million appeared first on Coin Edition.
